sailpoint.object
Class SMSResetConfig

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      sailpoint.object.SMSResetConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
public class SMSResetConfig
extends AbstractXmlObject

This class is the object representing SMS text Reset Password configuration. Typically, you need all these properties, so they are consolidated into this one configuration object.

See Also:

getFromPhone

public java.lang.String getFromPhone()
Returns:
The "from" phone number that will appear on the sms text message. Must be in E.164 phone format if this number is not from the US or Canada.

getThrottleMinutes

public int getThrottleMinutes()
Returns:
The duration (minutes) of time below which additional messages will be throttled.

Parameters:
